channel.title: Sitewide Poll! Unban Xerxes?
channel.description:
Alright. I figure this is something the entire community should vote on. Plz vote, and don't screw around in the thread. We need to find out what the popular opinion is. We have a democracy here and we should be able to make this desicion (sp?)
Admins and Mods. Don't lock this plz. I'm actually serious about this.
PLZ VOTE!! YOUR OPINION COUNTS!!
Mopar, if it comes out we want him unbanned, will you go with your community?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 04, 2006, 09:46:24 PM[/size][hr]Vote damnit!
Feel free to Post your THOUGHTS as well, i dont need flame wars here.

item.title: Sitewide Poll! Unban Xerxes?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Splid:

Firstly would you mind telling some of us people who XERXES was, i havn’t heard of him, or any thing he has done for the community. And also, what was he banned for?

Xerxes was a helpful guy at times, but is on his second ban for spamming/flaming.

Read full topic

item.title: Sitewide Poll! Unban Xerxes?
item.dc:creator: @i.r.xerxes.plz i.r.xerxes.plz
item.description:
@i.r.xerxes.plz wrote:

moparisthebest:

its a temp ban, not a permanent one

It’s a perm, and thank you for replying to my emails.

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:12, topic:7988”]My god, you people can’t even live without him for 1 day.

Sad, lonely people.[/quote]

No, because I am cool and you ain’t. Emo kid.

Squigglyo:

i think he got what he deserves, but if he can learn from his mistakes…many many mistakes. then i think he deserves yet another chance.

I haven’t done any mistakes, I don’t regreat anything, summary: care meter: 0%.

Pyro:

God blackthursday what does it matter. This community is a dictatorship. Not a god damn democracy. What mopar or another admin says goes.

Algas removed my topics about complaints to the admin, it was a serious one. He deleted my “free speech” topics also. He removes all my threads to silence me, hah.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:23, topic:7988”]Excuse me, it is not wether we have dictator ship. That in no way reflects the banning of him. He broke the rules. If we broke the rules in real life, we would be arrested, that doesn’t mean we are living under a dictatorship.

Think before you make stupid threads like this saying “Oooo admins are teh suxx0rz”[/quote]

I broke rules, you broke rules, and 20 other people broke the rules. I am the only one banned? Real life is different btw. Don’t compare RL to Internet asshole. Step away from Internet.

<3 i luv you all.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 05, 2006, 09:04:31 AM[/size][hr]Also, they will probably lock and delete this thread… so.

Read full topic

Think before you make stupid threads like this saying “Oooo admins are teh suxx0rz”[/quote]

Sorry chris i see what you mean i didnt mean it in that way. I was referring to these quotes from blackthursday.

PLZ VOTE!! YOUR OPINION COUNTS!!

Mopar, if it comes out we want him unbanned, will you go with your community?

We have a democracy here and we should be able to make this desicion (sp?)

m trying to make it so everyone gets a fair say.

item.title: Sitewide Poll! Unban Xerxes?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“zoss0, post:16, topic:7988”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=11253.msg126064#msg126064 date=1154752294]
If you guys continue this for the next 28 days you will be the most hated people on the forums. Possibly a perm ban aswell.

It’s only 28 days, decide if you want him back during that period. See how the forum comes along.
But wait, that can’t happen. Because Xerxes signs up on new accounts every seconds because he loves you guys to much.
[/quote]
Loves?! Do you see his recent posts?
My vote…Well you all know.[/quote]
The posts don’t count. What counts is that he can’t stay off the forums for 1 whole day without making a new account. Shows how much time he spends on the computer.

Read full topic
